values: little hopes/floating in my favorite night sky/too loaded/too ready to fall/and its not easy,/shaken stars are beautiful/after dreaming of a glorious horizon  that/i watched with you, my darling/but now its time/i woke up and the star is just shaken/ and the horizon/is just a horizon/and my naievity/caused every little glimmer of hope/to rush down the angel's cheeks/and dampen her wings/as she watches the little girl/with skinned knees/try to fly across the vast sky line/and come to the bitter, harsh reality/that sometimes dreams dont come true/and angel's wings soak in the fallen shimmers/of hope man has given up on/and, at the same time/given up on the little girl.

heyhey
so i got in my first accident today! ..wahoo.. not cool at all. over 500 dollars in damaage..but at least i'm ok, right?!  ugh..  so yea. accident = bad omen? i hope not.  i'm leaving for colorado tomorrow with jenn. that should be cool.  what else is on my mind... i want a boyfriend. i miss having someone there. mostly i miss jeff. i miss him like hell and its so hard not having him with me.    after my accident he was the first person i called. the FIRST person, he's the only one i'll ever wana run to to tell me that its all okay. yet its not. and i can't . and he donest care. or at least he pretends to..so its tough.

"i'm missing your laugh, how did it break? 
and when did your eyes begin to look fake?
i hope you're as happy as youre pretending.."

so, stuff. guys are damn confusing!  a girl u get along with really well wants u, take the damn chance. stop bein such a lazy dickhead about it. yea, i'm hating boys rite now. wow..i've had way too much candy today!  so my friend ben from rockford just called me all crazy about some girl...its the cutest th ing in the world..and bein in love in the best feeling ever and i hope he doens't get hurt, cuz he rocks the boat.  but yea. i told him he's gota tell her how he feels. sometimes i think i should take my own advice. blech.   well i'm going to go but i'm sure ill be back later. bye~*

hey guys~
what's going on?  so yea...leavin for colorado with jenn on friday! w ahooie..cept her and i havn't talked in weeks cuz she's overobessive with her boyfriend, andy. she has'nt talked to any of us (the girls) in so long and its really annoying. i mean i guess its a taste of my own medicine, after what i did with jeff. but still..its just craziness i guess. things are pretty good. i still really like this one guy that i was k inda with but he seems to be pulling away. of course that could just be me being all..ugh nobody loves me.but i dono.  hopefully we'll get to hang out soon before i leave. or after. i've been feeling horrible, i can't play in my friend adam's band for his graduation party which i promised him..cuz now i'm goin to colorado. and i told him today and he seemed so gross about it..but hes the kinda guy that wouldn't tell u if he was mad about somethin cuz hes so darn nice.  its frustrating. i'll just get him a really sweet grad present and try to make it up to him cuz i feel bad about it. well that's all for now..i'm gona go get out of my pj's (its 1:15!)  later.

AHHHHH!!!!
I WON SOMETHING! I WON JIMMY EAT WORLD TIX OFF OF THE RADIO!AND AN AUTOGRAPHED CD! OH MY GOD! CAN YOU BELIEVE IT! HOLY SHIT! WOW! I NEVER WIN ANYTHING! I'M THE LUCKIEST GIRL ALIVE! WELL KINDA! WAHOOIE!  NUMBER 9 IS NOW THE LUCKY NUMBER BABY! YEA!!!!

hey people..what's goin on?  nothing realy here...2:08AM and i really can't sleep.  so what's been goin on lately. today..or yesterday i went shoppin with my sister and then i went to dinner with scott, donnie, erica and her friend. and then scott donnie and i went to a movie (the bourne identity)  it was pretty good....then i got home and my sister and i started to make a photo album for my parents (its their annirversary tomorrow).  and we were goin thru pics and i saw a pile of old ones of jeff and i.  they were so cute..we were crazy kids together there must have been 40 pictures... at least..and at first it made me real happy. cuz its so cute. but then it was like..wow..that sucks.. you know?  i mean i'm not going to let it get me down or ne thing.  its kinda nice how i like someone new..thats always great. but things are a little shaky still. i guess its just the after math.  we'll see what happens..i'm just pleased i'm doin better i guess. things are ..er...intresting.  i miss my friend dan, i havn't seen the kid in forever.   today i bought the new new found glory cd. its pretty good..me gusta :O) i'm gona go try and sleep tho.  night!
i just wanted to see these smiley things working

hey,
     i've never really written in  here before. let's see...i'm 16..i'm a junior in high school...i like good music like rock, alternative, ska and jazz ;-)  i play the trumpet.  hmm what else, i'm single! (takin applications..yea baby)  i've been trying to get a job for months, but hey, whatever.  i like to write poetry and songs, and i really like to draw and paint..yea..artsy ness.   i lead a pretty normal teenage life.. u kno hanging with friends, goin to movies, eating at iHOP,...watchin cartoons, and reading calvin and hobbes.but yes. i'm gona go cuz i can't write too much more.  thanks for reading this ;o)
